string.name: cat_sidesheet_title
string.description: Title of the Side Sheet Catalog demo. The term Side Sheet is a product term. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_sidesheet_description
string.description: Description of the Side Sheet Catalog Demo. The term Side Sheet is a product term. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Displays a demo of Side Sheets.

string.name: cat_sidesheet_switch_text
string.description: Label of switch that enables and disables fullscreen mode. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_sidesheet_expansion_switch_text
string.description: Label of switch that restricts and unrestricts sheet expansion. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_sidesheet_slide_offset_text
string.description: Text that describes the slide offset value. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_sidesheet_button_label_enabled
string.description: Label of button when enabled. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_sidesheet_button_label_disabled
string.description: Label of button when disabled. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_sidesheet_button_clicked
string.description: Text shown when the button is clicked. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_sidesheet_standard_title
string.description: Title of the standard side sheet. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_sidesheet_standard_button_show_text
string.description: Label of button which shows the standard side sheet. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_sidesheet_standard_detached_title
string.description: Title of the detached standard side sheet. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_sidesheet_standard_detached_button_show_text
string.description: Label of button which shows the detached standard side sheet. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_sidesheet_standard_vertically_scrolling_button_show_text
string.description: Label of button which shows the standard side sheet. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Show Vertically Scrolling Standard Side Sheet

string.name: cat_sidesheet_modal_title
string.description: Title of the modal side sheet. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_sidesheet_modal_button_show_text
string.description: Label of button which shows the modal side sheet. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_sidesheet_modal_detached_title
string.description: Title of the detached modal side sheet. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_sidesheet_modal_detached_button_show_text
string.description: Label of button which shows the detached modal side sheet. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_sidesheet_coplanar_title
string.description: Title of the coplanar side sheet. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_sidesheet_coplanar_button_show_text
string.description: Label of button which shows the modal side sheet. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_sidesheet_coplanar_detached_title
string.description: Title of the detached coplanar side sheet. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_sidesheet_coplanar_detached_button_show_text
string.description: Label of button which shows the detached coplanar side sheet. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_sidesheet_close_button_content_desc
string.description: Content description for the button to hide the side sheet. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
